page.title: 14The life of Mr Alman 1.
page.content: Mr Alman likes living here because it is a very friendly neighbourhood before he retired he was a caretaker for our school,but now he works busily in his garage mending old cars. The village and our lane has changed since he first lived here,mostly houses.The changes are are for the better because it has become a more friendly lane.Mr Alman has two memories in his life the happiest when he got married and the saddest when Bella their dog died.He has four hobbies which are reading,astronomy, photograghy and bowling.He practices these as often as possible,with his wife in in the garden.He does his bowling at Bartomley Bowling Green.He Alman and his wife go shopping once a week by car to crewe.Every sunday Mrs Alman goes to church while while Mr Alman does mechanical work in his garage.
